Package algorithms.disjointSets

package algorithms.disjointSets
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    algorithms
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    DisjointForest<T>
    An "all-in-one" class to handle the disjoint set methods and the nodes in a disjoint forest of trees.
    DisjointForest.RootedTreeDisjointSet<T>
    each disjoint set (== instance of this class), has a representative which is a member of the nodes of this set
    DisjointSet2Helper
    a disjoint set implemented as a forest.
    DisjointSet2Node<T>
    a node for the forest implementation of the disjoint set.
    UnionFind
    a version of Tarjan's Disjoint Forest, union find for a fixed number of vertices
